alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Henderson; Kaufman; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kaufman, northwestern Henderson, northeastern Ellis and central Navarro Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Cottonwood, or 11 miles east of Ennis, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Ennis, Gun Barrel City, Mabank, Malakoff, Tool, Palmer, Kerens, Seven Points, Kemp, Eustace, Trinidad, Bardwell, Angus, Grays Prairie, Alma, Enchanted Oaks, Caney City, Navarro and Cottonwood. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 218 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
